verbs.description: unsaddle (third-person singular simple present unsaddles, present participle unsaddling, simple past and past participle unsaddled)

examples: […]  sette him vppe, and tye him in his bridle to the bare Racke, and all to rubbe and chafe him, insomuch that if hee be eyther wette with sweate or any other thing, you leaue hym not till he be as dry as may be, then vnsaddle him, rub hys backe thorowly  […]

entries.meaning: (transitive) To throw (a rider) from the saddle.
